thread.title: 2018 BMW 640xi GT: A High-Riding, Roomy Sedan That’s Fun to Drive

author: Dan Neil
title: 2018 BMW 640xi GT: A High-Riding, Roomy Sedan That’s Fun to Drive
text:
SKINNY PEOPLE must be stopped. What with their clingy jeans, single chins and sensible, mostly plant-based diets. Who the hell do they think they are?
For too long, skinny people—I’m not saying bony, but others might—have skewed the ergonomic models carmakers design around, typically representing the 90th percentile of human form. That is so elitist.
... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
